TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SyntaxFacts extends System.Object
public ref class SyntaxFacts abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Defines a set of methods to determine how Unicode characters are treated by the C# compiler.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EqualityComparer As IEqualityComparer(Of SyntaxKind)

Docs.remarks: PERF: The framework specializes EqualityComparer for enums, but only if the underlying type is System.Int32 Since SyntaxKind's underlying type is System.UInt16, ObjectEqualityComparer will be chosen instead.

.method public static hidebysig bool IsReservedTupleElementName(string elementName) cil managed
Public Function IsReservedTupleElementName (elementName As String) As Boolean

Docs.summary:
Checks whether the element name is reserved.
For example: "Item3" is reserved (at certain positions). "Rest", "ToString" and other members of System.ValueTuple are reserved (in any position). Names that are not reserved return false.
